footer.aboutText: Active Soft is a leading provider of technology solutions, specializing in Oracle ERP systems and custom software development to empower businesses.

hero.title: Empowering Your Business with Innovative Technology
hero.subtitle: We deliver cutting-edge ERP solutions, managed IT services, and custom software to help you achieve your goals.

services.title: Our Core Solutions
services.subtitle: Providing comprehensive services to meet the demands of modern business.

features.erpDesc: Streamline your operations with our expert Oracle ERP implementation and support.
features.itSupportDesc: Reliable, proactive managed IT services to keep your systems running smoothly 24/7.
features.customAppsDesc: Bespoke desktop and web applications tailored to your unique business needs and workflows.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?

workStages.title: Work Stages
workStages.slogan: Smart planning is one of the most important factors of distinction and success
stages: Initial planning of the complete project vision
Reviewing this vision with the client and making necessary adjustments
Implementation phase (duration varies based on project size)
Delivering the final project structure, reviewing it with the client, and applying finishing touches

services.title: Our Comprehensive Services
services.subtitle: Tailored technology solutions to drive your business forward.
services.erpDesc: Full-cycle Oracle ERP services including implementation, customization, migration, and support to optimize your business processes.
services.erpFeaturesDesc: Our ERP system is designed to provide comprehensive solutions for businesses of all sizes. Here are some of the key features it offers:

features.multiUser: Multiple user permissions with precise management
features.remoteAccess: Ability to work from anywhere via the Internet
features.autoBackup: Automatic backups created multiple times daily
features.auditTrail: Complete audit trail showing who added, modified, or deleted
features.employeeDocs: Entry of employee photos and documents
features.foreignCurrency: Foreign currency support with fixed or variable rates per transaction
features.multiCompany: Multiple companies or branches with consolidated reports
features.exchangeRate: Exchange rate determination for foreign currencies
features.notes: Notes entry for each journal entry item
features.cashierLink: Link each cashier to a specific employee
features.collectionPayment: Recording collection and payment operations with separate documents

costingModule.title: Costing Module
costingModule.subtitle: Comprehensive production cost management system with actual costing methodology
costingModule.methodologyDesc: The system is based on Actual Costing during the production month.
methodologyItems: Indirect industrial expenses (General service centers + Production services)
costingModule.bomTitle: Raw Materials and BOM (Bill of Materials)
costingModule.bomDesc1: Material ratios for each product are determined through BOM.
costingModule.bomDesc2: The system automatically issues raw material documents according to BOM ratios.
costingModule.bomDesc3: Variable materials are manually issued based on workshop instructions.
costingModule.bomDesc4: When entering actual inventory at the end of the month:
bomItems: The system modifies automatic issue documents to accommodate inventory differences (increase/decrease).
Inventory differences are distributed to production orders.
costingModule.qualityDesc1: A portion of production is issued for inspection and loaded to Quality Inspection cost.
costingModule.qualityDesc2: Quantity can be returned for inspection or to the warehouse, resulting in automatic reduction of quality expense.
costingModule.directExpensesDesc: Recorded in one of two ways:
directExpensesItems: Daily entries loaded to production lines.
Or raw material issuance from warehouses to production lines.
costingModule.indirectExpensesDesc1: Recorded on General or Production service centers.
costingModule.indirectExpensesDesc2: Monthly distribution ratios are recorded showing the benefit of each production line from each service center.
costingModule.indirectExpensesDesc3: The system issues entries to load expenses from service centers to production lines.
costingModule.indirectExpensesDesc4: If part of the expenses remains unloaded, it appears in the Income Statement.
costingModule.costDistributionDesc1: Each production order is loaded with its share of expenses based on:
costDistributionItems: Or production quantity as an alternative when time is not recorded.
costingModule.costDistributionDesc3: Production quantity is weighted by product selling price to achieve fair distribution of industrial expenses.
costingModule.valuationDesc1: Product valuation is done at actual cost monthly.
costingModule.valuationDesc2: Valuation is fixed as an inventory addition document affecting Cost of Goods Sold (COGS).
costingModule.multiPeriodTitle: Production Orders Spanning Multiple Financial Periods
costingModule.multiPeriodDesc1: When a production order spans multiple periods:
multiPeriodItems: Cost is accumulated throughout the entire order duration.
If previous period costs are different, the system requests reopening periods to modify valuation.
costingModule.stagesDesc1: The system supports products requiring multiple production stages.
costingModule.stagesDesc2: Each stage cost is calculated separately.
costingModule.stagesDesc3: A stage's production is revalued as raw material for the next stage.
costingModule.stagesDesc4: The sequence continues until the final stage.
costingModule.lotsDesc1: Definition of different lots for incoming raw materials.
costingModule.lotsDesc2: Raw material issuance to work orders is done according to lots.
costingModule.lotsDesc3: Helps track poor raw materials and load responsibility on the supplier.
costingModule.lotsDesc4: Example: Cement from 3 suppliers → 3 lots for the same item.
costingModule.shiftsDesc2: Helps identify human errors when quality issues arise.
costingModule.shiftsDesc3: Multiple shift systems can be used (e.g., Ramadan shifts).
costingModule.productionDataDesc: In the production document, the following are recorded:
productionDataItems: Mixer counter before and after operation to calculate distance traveled
costingModule.productionEvaluationDesc1: Production document is evaluated at actual cost automatically.
costingModule.productionEvaluationDesc2: Raw materials under processing are reduced by automatic entries.
costingModule.productionEvaluationDesc3: Update is done directly when any cost element changes.
reportsItems: Production cost report for any time period showing: Production orders (start - end date), Production quantities, Total cost, Average unit cost, Totals by effort/content/stage/period.

Detailed production order cost list showing: Production quantity and cost by quality grades, Unit cost price, Raw material cost analysis, Industrial expenses, Expense analysis at any account level, Quantities used, their value, and average consumption per production unit.
costingModule.bomExampleTitle: BOM Example - Product: 1m³ Concrete Strength 350 Content 450
costingModule.salesTrackingDesc1: Sales orders are recorded before production orders.
costingModule.salesTrackingDesc3: Display showing each production movement and each sales transaction made on the sales order.

manufacturingModule.title: Manufacturing & Production Management System
manufacturingModule.subtitle: Comprehensive system for managing manufacturing processes with advanced cost tracking and performance analysis
manufacturingModule.costTrackingDesc: The manufacturing and production management system can track costs associated with each product or manufacturing process. Costs for materials, labor, equipment, and technology used in each process are assigned, helping to determine the actual production cost.
manufacturingModule.performanceAnalysisDesc: The manufacturing and production management system can be used to analyze the performance of manufacturing processes and identify the most efficient processes and those that need improvement. Costs and productivity can be analyzed to identify the most effective processes and the most profitable products.
manufacturingModule.costManagementDesc: The manufacturing and production management system can be used to improve cost management and identify activities or products that consume additional resources and need cost improvement. Costs can be compared and analyzed to identify optimal strategies for achieving cost savings.
manufacturingModule.productionPlanningDesc: The manufacturing and production management system can be used for production planning and determining resource needs. Future production costs can be analyzed and estimated, and optimal strategies for cost management and efficiency achievement can be identified.
manufacturingModule.profitabilityEvaluationDesc: The manufacturing and production management system can be used to evaluate the profitability of each product or manufacturing process. Costs and revenues can be analyzed to identify the most profitable products and expected costs to achieve optimal profitability.

inventoryModule.title: Inventory Management
inventoryModule.subtitle: Comprehensive inventory management system with advanced tracking and valuation capabilities
inventoryModule.structureAdditional: Additional flexible classification based on business activity that does not affect coding
inventoryModule.structureLots: Dividing a single item into multiple lots
lotsFunctionsItems: Track raw material source and identify supplier in case of defects
Manage orders that depend on a specific supplier or batch
inventoryModule.itemAttributesReports: Ability to display inventory reports based on any of these attributes
inventoryModule.warehousesDesc: Warehouse classification by type (raw materials - finished products - work in progress - spare parts)
inventoryModule.warehousesLocations: Internal division into storage locations within each warehouse
inventoryModule.reorderDesc2: System automatically identifies items that need to be reordered
inventorySystemItems: Inventory differences are processed accounting-wise in documents and warehouses
inventoryModule.qualityTestsDesc1: Quality testing available for finished products or purchases
inventoryModule.qualityTestsDesc2: Support for testing at any stage of production
inventoryDocsItems: Sales issues - Production issues - Cost center issues
Any documents specific to business activity
inventoryModule.inventoryDocsAccountingTitle: All documents automatically generate accounting entries including:
inventoryModule.valuationDesc2: Valuation of new purchases directly affects inventory cost
inventoryModule.productionIssueDesc1: Automatic issuance of raw materials according to product BOM
productionIssueItems: Differences are automatically accommodated in all issue documents
Difference distribution on production orders with precise ratio
inventoryModule.basicAccountsTitle: Basic Accounts Required to Define a Product Group
inventoryModule.basicAccountsDesc: The following accounts must be defined before using the group:

details: Debit side for additions and credit side for issues
Debit for inventory shortages and credit for surpluses
For issuing items to cost centers
For issuing raw materials to production orders

inventoryModule.basicAccountsNote: Without these accounts, inventory documents cannot be recorded
inventoryModule.reportExamplesTitle: Examples of Reports Supported by the System
reportExamplesProductionItems: Production cost report during a period
Cost of raw materials for orders + absorbed expenses
Production order movement (quantity - raw material cost - stage cost - unit cost)
Average unit cost for each order
reportExamplesCostCentersItems: Analysis of what was issued from raw materials to each cost center

services.itSupportDesc: Proactive 24/7 monitoring, helpdesk support, and IT infrastructure management to ensure your systems are always secure and efficient.
services.customAppsDesc: We design, develop, and deploy bespoke desktop and web applications that solve unique business challenges and integrate seamlessly with your existing systems.
services.securityDesc: Implementing bank-level security protocols to protect your data, applications, and network from evolving cyber threats.

prices.subtitle: Choose the solution that aligns with your business goals. All plans are fully customizable to your specific requirements.

services.title: Oracle ERP Implementation
services.description: Complete Oracle ERP Cloud implementation services including system analysis, data migration, custom module development, and user training for seamless digital transformation.
features: Cloud infrastructure setup and optimization
Legacy system data migration with zero data loss
Custom module development for industry-specific needs
Real-time integration with existing business systems
Comprehensive user training and change management

services.title: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Optimization
services.description: Comprehensive ERP system optimization services to enhance performance, streamline processes, and maximize ROI from existing Oracle ERP investments.
features: Performance analysis and bottleneck identification
Database optimization and tuning
Custom report development
Workflow automation and process improvement
Integration with third-party applications

services.title: Export Management System
services.description: Accounting software that handles all calculations for suppliers, customers, warehouses, treasury, and banks. It aggregates supplier data, accounts, invoices, tracks inventory and items, manages export operations to different countries, and handles operational items with expense allocation to each operation.
features: Integrated management of supplier and customer accounts
Inventory tracking and continuous item counting
Export operations management to different countries
Processing of operational items and expense allocation
Integration of all accounting operations with treasury and banks

services.title: Custom Windows Desktop Application Development
services.description: Tailored Windows desktop applications designed to automate business processes, improve workflow efficiency, and integrate seamlessly with existing enterprise systems.
features: Native Windows application development
Database integration (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL)
Offline functionality with data synchronization
Advanced reporting and analytics
Scalable architecture for future expansion

services.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics Solutions
services.description: Advanced business intelligence platform development using Oracle Analytics Cloud and custom dashboard solutions for data-driven decision making.
features: Interactive dashboard development
Real-time data visualization
Predictive analytics and forecasting
KPI tracking and performance monitoring
Data warehouse design and implementation

services.title: Supply Chain Management & Logistics Optimization
services.description: End-to-end supply chain management solution with real-time tracking, inventory optimization, and logistics coordination for improved operational efficiency.
features: Real-time inventory tracking and management
Supplier relationship management
Demand forecasting and planning
Warehouse management system
Transportation and logistics coordination

services.title: Sales Representatives and Sales Managers Management
services.description: Comprehensive solution for managing sales representatives and sales managers with detailed performance tracking and commission management.
features: Periodic reports on representative and branch performance
Monitoring sales representatives' performance and linking their sales to customers
Special permissions for sales managers to monitor the market and make faster decisions
Tracking cash collections and checks for each representative
Ability to link representative commissions to actual collections or sales volume
Setting sales targets (Goals) and comparing actual results

services.title: HR and Payroll Management System
services.description: Complete and integrated system with financial accounts for managing employee affairs and payroll calculations.
features: Based on variable settings for insurance, vacations, and taxes that can be modified when laws change
Respects all payroll calculation rules and penalty provisions, carrying over excess of five days to subsequent months
Maintains employee photos and all employment documents with reports on missing documents
Tracks document expiration dates to notify employees of renewals
Records who entered and modified data with a period transfer system to prevent tampering
Ability to reverse period transfers to modify data according to permissions

services.title: Smart Scale System
services.description: Intelligent weighing system that automates weight recording and integrates directly with your inventory and financial systems.
features: Automatic recording of actual weight for products, pallets, or containers without human intervention
Prevention of manipulation or manual input errors
Comparison of actual weight with standard weight to detect deviations or losses
Direct generation of invoices and costs based on real weight
Instant updating of inventory and financial accounts with each weighing operation
Direct integration between electronic scales and packaging stations within system

retail.name: Retail & E-commerce
retail.challenges: Inventory tracking across multiple locations, customer experience optimization, and seasonal demand fluctuations.

education.solution: Comprehensive student information systems and learning platforms that streamline administrative tasks and enhance educational outcomes.

logistics.name: Logistics & Transportation

logistics.solution: End-to-end logistics management systems with GPS tracking and automated scheduling to optimize delivery routes and reduce costs.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.subtitle: See how we've helped businesses like yours achieve their goals.

studies.title: Streamlining Production for a Major Manufacturer
studies.challenge: Our client faced significant production delays and inventory inaccuracies due to a disconnected legacy system.
studies.solution: We implemented a tailored Oracle ERP solution that integrated their entire production workflow from raw materials to finished goods.
studies.result: Achieved a 30% reduction in production time and a 99.8% inventory accuracy rate within the first year.

studies.title: Optimizing Agricultural Export Operations for a Major Farming Cooperative
studies.challenge: A large agricultural cooperative needed to streamline their export documentation, inventory tracking, and cost allocation across multiple farming stations and international markets.
studies.solution: We developed a comprehensive accounting and export management system that integrated supplier data, inventory management, warehouse operations, and detailed cost tracking for each export shipment.
studies.result: Achieved 35% improvement in export processing time and 99.5% accuracy in cost allocation across all operations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

questions.q: What is Oracle ERP and how can it benefit my business?
questions.a: Oracle ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) is a suite of integrated business management applications. It helps automate and streamline your core processes like finance, HR, manufacturing, and supply chain, leading to increased efficiency, better decision-making, and reduced operational costs.

questions.q: How long does a typical custom software project take?
questions.a: Project timelines vary depending on the complexity and scope of the application. A small project might take a few weeks, while a large-scale enterprise system can take several months. We provide a detailed project timeline after our initial consultation and analysis phase.

questions.q: Is your pricing fixed or do you offer custom quotes?
questions.a: While we have starting prices for common service packages, most of our projects are custom-quoted. This ensures you only pay for what you need. We provide a detailed, transparent proposal after thoroughly understanding your requirements.

questions.q: What kind of support do you offer after a project is completed?
questions.a: We offer various post-launch support and maintenance packages. This includes technical support, bug fixes, security updates, and options for ongoing feature enhancements to ensure your application remains effective and up-to-date.

questions.q: Do you work with international clients?
questions.a: Yes, absolutely. While we are based in Cairo, we have successfully delivered projects for clients across the globe. We leverage modern communication tools to ensure seamless collaboration regardless of your location.

exportModule.title: Export Management System
exportModule.subtitle: Comprehensive export management system with detailed shipment tracking and financial analysis
exportModule.shipmentTrackingDesc: The system displays detailed information for each shipment, including:
shipmentTrackingItems: Lot No. associated with raw materials or products
financialValuesItems: Shipment value in the client's foreign currency
Equivalent value in Egyptian pounds according to the exchange rate recorded in the system
exportModule.costBreakdownDesc: The system clearly displays the cost breakdown into:
costBreakdownItems: Raw material costs (raw materials - packaging materials - auxiliary materials)
exportModule.actualExpensesDesc: Monitor all expenses associated with each shipment, including:
actualExpensesItems: Raw material supply invoices for the shipment
exportModule.internalCostBreakdown: Internal cost breakdown into main elements with precision
collectionsDiscountsItems: Discount granted to the client (if any)
Collections: Collection percentage, amount collected, cash payment dates
Net invoice after collections: (Invoice value - Discount - Collected payments)
Remaining balance on the client for their transactions with the company: Total invoices, Total collections, Total discounts
exportModule.archiveDesc1: Save all shipment data in a complete electronic file
exportModule.archiveDesc2: Maintain a special archive for documents:
exportModule.archiveBenefit: This facilitates reference for any review or accounting reconciliation
exportModule.shipmentItemsDesc: Divide the shipment into items according to:
shipmentItemsItems: Number of units inside each pallet
exportModule.expenseDistribution: The system uses this data to distribute general expenses (shipping - preparation - clearance):
exportModule.distributionMethod: The system distributes expenses according to the number of pallets as a percentage of total monthly operations

concreteManagement.title: Concrete Management System
concreteManagement.subtitle: Complete Solution for Ready-Mix Concrete Plants
concreteManagement.description: An integrated system to manage all operations of ready-mix concrete plants with high accuracy and complete flexibility.
features: Multi-plant operations with ability to transfer vehicles (cost centers) between branches
Complete tracking of production process from raw materials entry to concrete preparation
Automatic inventory alerts to prevent production interruption
Quality control linking final product to raw materials with ability to modify components during production
Direct sales capability with one-step manufacturing and daily invoice issuance
Comprehensive reports for production operations matching with laboratory reports

cards.title: Customers and Sales
cards.description: Complete management of customer accounts, sales orders, and invoices with detailed reporting

cards.title: Fixed Assets
cards.description: Tracking and management of all fixed assets with depreciation calculations

cards.title: Inventory and Warehouses
cards.description: Comprehensive inventory management with real-time tracking across multiple warehouses

cards.title: Receipt Papers
cards.description: Automatic entry creation from receipt papers between customer and establishment with all accounting movements

cards.title: Payment Papers
cards.description: Complete management of payment operations including payment and return with automatic accounting entries

cards.title: Customer Accounts
cards.description: Entry of receipts (cash or check) with detailed reports to track customer accounts

cards.title: Supplier Accounts
cards.description: Monitoring of supplier accounts and extraction of account statements

cards.title: General Accounts
cards.description: Chart of accounts with unlimited levels and daily entries automatically created from different system modules

cards.title: Treasuries and Banks
cards.description: Definition of multiple treasuries and documentation of receipt and payment operations

concreteManagement.financialMovementsDescription: Provides you with many vouchers such as receipt vouchers and their details, voucher number, receipt number, entry number and its analytical, as well as payment vouchers and linking them to accounts and due date. The program also allows you to code the movements of collections from customers and payments to suppliers and code the representative responsible for that, whether this movement is cash, check, transfer, network, or direct collector and all required data in the type of movement and automatic collection of due checks.
concreteManagement.transferDescription: Ease of transfer and settlements, the program enables you to transfer from warehouse to warehouse as well as transfer request, settlement of disbursement and addition and losses, visa settlement, settlement of sales checks, disbursement and addition permissions and their returns.
concreteManagement.productionDescription: Define concrete equations according to different efforts, and upon creating an order, the program automatically performs the production process.
concreteManagement.hrDescription: Through it, a database for employees is created, different jobs are defined, and employee documents are attached.
concreteManagement.suppliersDescription: Purchase orders and supply orders are created, purchase invoices are made, and a database for suppliers is created with all their data.
concreteManagement.accountingDescription: Enables you to post to accounts and sub-centers a group of entries under certain conditions and the ability to renumber daily entries.
concreteManagement.itemsDescription: The program allows you to manage warehouses, stores, and items through comprehensive data for items: name, code, alternative codes for the item, alternative items, carton barcode, measurement units for items, coding items in groups, and whether the item is normal or a mixture. If it's a mixture, what are the raw materials involved in its composition, and when assembling the mixture, the program automatically deducts from the raw materials according to their percentage in the mixture composition. Ability to add a service to the item and a price for each service (delivery service for example), add images to items and coding in more than one store with different prices, types of item services and the commission on them, item grouping.
concreteManagement.keyFeaturesDescription: Integrated system to manage all operations of ready-mix concrete plants with high accuracy and complete flexibility
concreteManagement.multiPlantDescription: Multi-plant management with ability to transfer vehicles (cost centers) between branches
concreteManagement.productionTrackingDescription: Complete tracking of production process from raw materials entry to concrete preparation
concreteManagement.inventoryAlertsDescription: Automatic alerts for raw material inventory quantities to prevent production interruption
concreteManagement.qualityControlDescription: Linking final product to raw materials with ability to modify components during production
concreteManagement.directSalesDescription: Direct sales capability with one-step manufacturing and daily invoice issuance
concreteManagement.detailedReportingDescription: Comprehensive reports for production operations matching with laboratory reports
concreteManagement.financialManagementDescription: Integrated accounting system covering all financial aspects of managing ready-mix concrete plants
concreteManagement.costCentersDescription: Calculation of cost and revenue for vehicles, mixers, and pumps (cost centers) to determine detailed profit and loss
concreteManagement.detailedFinancialReportsDescription: Ability to extract income statement and balance sheet for each separate branch and consolidated company extracts
concreteManagement.compoundTaxInvoicesDescription: Ability to create invoices with compound tax at invoice level and item level
concreteManagement.costManagementDescription: Creation of unlimited direct and indirect costs, linking them to products, with fair distribution of indirect costs
concreteManagement.financialMovementsDescription2: Receipt and payment vouchers linked to accounts and due dates, coding collections from customers and payments to suppliers movements
concreteManagement.transfersAndSettlementsDescription: Easy transfer and settlements from warehouse to warehouse, disbursement and addition settlements, visa settlements, and sales check settlements
concreteManagement.ctaTitle: Interested in a ready-mix concrete plant management program?
concreteManagement.ctaDescription: Contact us today to learn more about how our program can help you manage your plant efficiently and accurately.
